data.title: Heaven Can Wait
data.meta_description: A Los Angeles Rams quarterback, accidentally taken away from his body by an overanxious angel before he was meant to die, returns to life in the body of a recently murdered millionaire.
data.text:
Summary A Los Angeles Rams quarterback, accidentally taken away from his body by an overanxious angel before he was meant to die, returns to life in the body of a recently murdered millionaire.

Directed By: Warren Beatty, Buck Henry

Written By: Elaine May, Warren Beatty, Harry Segall, Robert Towne

Summary A Los Angeles Rams quarterback, accidentally taken away from his body by an overanxious angel before he was meant to die, returns to life in the body of a recently murdered millionaire.
